name: pxGOLD Synthetic Gold Expiring 31 Mar 2022
public_notice: Contract address has changed from 0x43e7ffd5f242bd2448066f3e1da57e4c6653ab17 to 0x5247C0DB4044FB6F97f32C7E1B48758019A5A912
additional_notices: No active trades are found for this coin. Please contact hello@coingecko.com if you think this is an error

description.en:
pxGOLD is a synthetic asset tracking the price of one fine troy ounce of gold, fully backed by PERL token.
This pxGOLD expires at 15:00, March 31, 2022 (UTC) and will be redeemable for equivalent value of PERL at the time of expiry.
